name: APforums for Narutoforums
description: ONLY for narutoforums.com: Orange style!!! This is a ripoff of apforums/vBulletin 4.x style. Still in work and will be updated. Chrome is recommended for this style. Firefox doesn't support some changes.
additional_info: This style is meant for me to get the templates ready for making other styles. I will optimize this style and when it's finished, I will create a completely new one. Until then, I will update this one.
css: @-moz-document domain("narutoforums.com") {/** * new style for narutoforums.com ver. 0.1.0 * MODIFIED by Black Mirror via "stylish - userstyle.org" * Extension for Chrome https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/stylish/fjnbnpbmkenffdnngjfgmeleoegfcffe * all images uploaded on imgur.com and apforums.net */ /*basic structure begin*/ div[style="padding:0px 25px 0px 25px"]{padding:5px!important;} /*basic structure end*/ /************************* **Replacing images begin** *************************/ /*DO NOT CHANGE THIS BEGIN*/ img[src="images/logo.gif"],img[src="images/statusicon3/forum_new.gif"],img[src="images/statusicon3/forum_old.gif"],img[src="images/misc/navbits_start.gif"],img[src="images/buttons3/reply.gif"],img[src="images/buttons3/newthread.gif"],img[src="images/buttons3/quote.gif"],img[src="images/buttons3/report.gif"],img[src="http://www.narutoforums.com/images/buttons3/multiquote_off.gif"],img[src="images/buttons3/quickreply.gif"],img[src="images/buttons3/reputation.gif"],img[src="images/buttons3/edit.gif"],img[src="images/rating/rating_1.gif"],img[src="images/rating/rating_2.gif"],img[src="images/rating/rating_3.gif"],img[src="images/rating/rating_4.gif"],img[src="images/rating/rating_5.gif"],img[src="images/buttons3/sortasc.gif"],img[src="images/buttons3/lastpost.gif"],img[src="images/statusicon3/thread_new.gif"],img[src="images/statusicon3/thread_hot_new.gif"],img[src="images/statusicon3/thread.gif"],img[src="images/statusicon3/thread_hot.gif"],img[src="images/statusicon3/thread_lock_new.gif"],img[src="images/statusicon3/thread_lock.gif"],img[src="images/statusicon3/thread_hot_lock.gif"],img[src="images/statusicon3/thread_dot.gif"],img[src="images/statusicon3/thread_dot_hot.gif"],img[src="images/statusicon3/thread_moved.gif"],img[src="images/statusicon3/forum_link.gif"],img[src="images/statusicon3/announcement_new.gif"],img[src="images/statusicon3/announcement_old.gif"],img[src="images/buttons3/sortdesc.gif"],img[src="images/buttons3/find.gif"],img[src="images/statusicon3/user_offline.gif"],img[src="images/statusicon3/user_online.gif"],img[src="images/icons/icon1.gif"],img[src="images/icons/icon13.gif"],img[src="images/icons/icon14.gif"],img[src="images/icons/icon4.gif"],img[src="images/icons/icon5.gif"],img[src="images/icons/icon8.gif"],img[src="images/icons/icon2.gif"],img[src="images/icons/icon9.gif"],img[src="http://i14.photobucket.com/albums/a311/SanativeStigma/yellowarrow.gif"],img[src="http://i14.photobucket.com/albums/a311/SanativeStigma/Heart1.gif"],img[src="http://i14.photobucket.com/albums/a311/SanativeStigma/icon_disk.gif"],img[src="images/editor/bold.gif"],img[src="images/editor/italic.gif"],img[src="images/editor/underline.gif"],img[src="images/editor/justifyleft.gif"],img[src="images/editor/justifycenter.gif"],img[src="images/editor/justifyright.gif"],img[src="images/editor/insertorderedlist.gif"],img[src="images/editor/insertunorderedlist.gif"],img[src="images/editor/outdent.gif"],img[src="images/editor/indent.gif"],img[src="images/editor/createlink.gif"],img[src="images/editor/unlink.gif"],img[src="images/editor/email.gif"],img[src="images/editor/insertimage.gif"],img[src="images/editor/quote.gif"],img[src="images/editor/code.gif"],img[src="http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/spriteninja/untitled14ju.gif"],img[src="http://img169.imageshack.us/img169/8837/testaq3.gif"],img[src="images/editor/youtube.gif"],img[src="images/editor/google.gif"],img[src="http://imgur.com/AnTcS.gif"],img[src="images/editor/redo.gif"],img[src="images/editor/undo.gif"],img[src="images/editor/smilie.gif"],img[src="images/editor/color.gif"],img[src="images/editor/removeformat.gif"],img[src="images/statusicon3/thread_dot_hot_new.gif"],img[src="images/statusicon3/thread_hot_lock_new.gif"],img[src="images/statusicon3/thread_dot_new.gif"],img[src="images/statusicon3/thread_dot_hot_lock.gif"],img[src="images/statusicon3/thread_dot_hot_lock_new.gif"]{width:0;height:0;} body form table.page+div,img[src="images/buttons3/firstnew.gif"],img[src="images/misc/navbits_finallink_ltr.gif"],img[src="images/misc/trashcan_small.gif"]{display:none;} a[name="top"]+table tr[background="http://static.anifreak.com/images/toperbg.jpg"]{position:fixed;top:0;left:0;width:100%;} a[name="top"]+table tr[background="http://static.anifreak.com/images/toperbg.jpg"] td:nth-child(1){position:relative;left:50%;} #vB_Editor_001_smiliebox{display:none} #vB_Editor_001_textarea{width:610px !important;border:none;} td[width="3%"] a{font-size:11px;padding: 2px 4px;border: none;border-radius: 3px;background-color: #F6F8F9;text-decoration: none;display: block;text-align: center;margin:0;} td[width="3%"]{padding:3px 1px;border:1px 0 1px 0 solid #426A57;} /*checkbox ratio design begin*/ /*removing the inputbox*/ input[type="radio"],input[type="checkbox"]{width:0;height:0;margin:6px;} /*setting the new box via image*/ input[type="radio"]::before,input[type="checkbox"]::before{position:absolute;margin: -10px 0 0 -10px;} input[type="radio"]::before{content:url(http://i.imgur.com/1L4J1.png);} input[type="checkbox"]::before{content:url(http://i.imgur.com/YjYTo.png);} /*hover state*/ input[type="radio"]:hover::before{content:url(http://i.imgur.com/Fr8e0.png);} input[type="checkbox"]:hover::before{content:url(http://i.imgur.com/wz4Ad.png);} /*selected state*/ input[type="radio"]:checked::before{content:url(http://i.imgur.com/9lkfO.png);} input[type="checkbox"]:checked::before{content:url(http://i.imgur.com/QGoyW.png);} /*disabled state*/ /*unchecked*/ input[type="radio"]:not(:checked):disabled::before{content:url(http://i.imgur.com/IKsSs.png);} input[type="checkbox"]:not(:checked):disabled::before{content:url(http://i.imgur.com/ad3MW.png);} /*checked*/ input[type="radio"]:disabled::before{content:url(http://i.imgur.com/ToFJy.png);} input[type="checkbox"]:disabled::before{content:url(http://i.imgur.com/51tiT.png);} /*checkbox ratio design end*/ /*DO NOT CHANGE THIS END*/ /*LOGO begin*/ img[src="images/logo.gif"]{padding-top:100px;/*height of the image divided by 2*/ padding-bottom:100px;padding-left:425px;/*width of the image divided by 2*/ padding-right:425px; background:url(http://apforums.net/images/styles/fishman_island/fi-banner.png) no-repeat center;margin-top:33px;} /*LOGO end*/ /*Reply,New Thread,Quote,Multi quote, direct reply, edit begin*/ img[src="images/buttons3/reply.gif"]{padding-top:13px;/*height of the image divided by 2*/ padding-bottom:13px;padding-left:76px;/*width of the image divided by 2*/ padding-right:76px; background:url(http://i.imgur.com/jRvVM.png) no-repeat center;} img[src="images/buttons3/newthread.gif"]{padding-top:13px;/*height of the image divided by 2*/ padding-bottom:13px;padding-left:76px;/*width of the image divided by 2*/ padding-right:76px; background:url(http://i.imgur.com/ymMiJ.png) no-repeat center;} img[src="images/buttons3/quote.gif"]{padding-top:8px;/*height of the image divided by 2*/ padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:60px;/*width of the image divided by 2*/ padding-right:60px; background:url(http://i.imgur.com/gnGat.png) no-repeat center;} img[src="images/buttons3/quote.gif"]:hover{background:url(http://i.imgur.com/wTgWj.png) no-repeat center;} img[src="http://www.narutoforums.com/images/buttons3/multiquote_off.gif"]{padding-top:8px;/*height of the image divided by 2*/ padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:11px;/*width of the image divided by 2*/ padding-right:11px;background:url(http://www.apforums.net/images/buttons/multiquote-back_40b.png) no-repeat center;} img[src="http://www.narutoforums.com/images/buttons3/multiquote_off.gif"]:hover{background:url(http://www.apforums.net/images/buttons/multiquote_40b-hover.png) no-repeat center;} img[src="images/buttons3/quickreply.gif"]{padding-top:8px;/*height of the image divided by 2*/ padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:27px;/*width of the image divided by 2*/ padding-right:27px; background:url(http://i.imgur.com/biVmg.png) no-repeat center;} img[src="images/buttons3/quickreply.gif"]:hover{background:url(http://i.imgur.com/VWqmL.png) no-repeat center;} img[src="images/buttons3/edit.gif"]{padding-top:8px;/*height of the image divided by 2*/ padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:34px;/*width of the image divided by 2*/ padding-right:34px; background:url(http://i.imgur.com/ntTiI.png) no-repeat center;} img[src="images/buttons3/edit.gif"]:hover{background:url(http://i.imgur.com/RO5Kg.png) no-repeat center;} /*end*/ /*user status begin*/ img[src="images/buttons3/report.gif"]{padding:8px;/*square image's length divided by 2. eg: if your image is 10pxx10px then your padding should be 5px*/ background:url(http://www.apforums.net/images/buttons/report-40b.png) no-repeat center;} img[src="images/buttons3/report.gif"]:hover{background:url(http://www.apforums.net/images/buttons/report-40b-hover.png) no-repeat center;} img[src="images/buttons3/reputation.gif"]{padding:8px;/*square image's length divided by 2. eg: if your image is 10pxx10px then your padding should be 5px*/ background:url(http://www.apforums.net/images/buttons/reputation-40b.png) no-repeat center;} img[src="images/statusicon3/user_offline.gif"]{padding:8px;/*square image's length divided by 2. eg: if your image is 10pxx10px then your padding should be 5px*/ should be 5px*/ background:url(http://apforums.net/images/styles/fishman_island/statusicon/forum_new-48.png) no-repeat center;} img[src="images/statusicon3/forum_old.gif"]{padding:24px;/*square *************************/ /** * vBulletin 3.7.2 CSS * Style: 'Orange';Style ID: 2 */ body{background: #386068;color: #636363;font: 10pt verdana, geneva, lucida, 'lucida grande', arial, helvetica, sans-serif;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;} a:link, body_alink{color: #1F1F1F;} a:visited, body_avisited{color: #1F1F1F;} a:hover, a:active, body_ahover{color: #499441} .page{background:#C6D6D6;padding:0;color: #1F1F1F;/*added content below*/ width:850px!important;} td, th, p, li{font: 10pt verdana, geneva, lucida, 'lucida grande', arial, helvetica, sans-serif;} .tborder{background: #426A57;color: #1F1F1F;border: none !important;/*added content below*/ border-spacing:0 1px;} .tcat{/*background: #618872 url(http://www.apforums.net/images/buttons/newbtn_middle.png) repeat-x;*/ background: #426A57 none !important;color: #FFFFFF;font: bold 10pt verdana, geneva, lucida, 'lucida grande', arial, helvetica, sans-serif;} .tcat a:link, .tcat_alink{color: #FFFFFF;text-decoration: none;} .tcat a:visited, .tcat_avisited{color: #FFFFFF;text-decoration: none;} .tcat a:hover, .tcat a:active, .tcat_ahover{color: #################################################################### || \*======================================================================*/ /* the container for the editor */ .vBulletin_editor{border: none;} /* the container for all the edit controls */ #controlbar, .controlbar{padding: 2px;} /* an individual button */ .imagebutton{left: 0px;top: 0px;} /* an individual WYSIWYG color element in the color popup */ .ocolor{padding: 2px;font-size: 1px;} /* WYSIWYG the part of the color element that gets colored */ .ocolor div{width: 10px;height: 10px;border: 1px solid #ACA899;} /* WYSIWYG font, size and smilie elements within popups */ .ofont, .osize, .osmilie, .otextlink{font: 11px tahoma;cursor: default;} /* style for WYSIWYG font option elements */ .ofont{padding: 0px 4px 0px 10px;font-size: 14px;height: 20px;} /* style for WYSIWYG size option elements */ .osize{padding: 0px 4px 0px 4px;width: 30px;} /* the smilie image within a WYSIWYG smilie popup */ .osmilie img{vertical-align: middle;margin: 4px;} /* text buttons within popup menus */ .otextlink{text-align: center;margin-top: 4px;height: 20px;} /* the left cell of a WYSIWYG popup menu control */ .popup_feedback{font: 11px tahoma;height: 18px;padding: 0px 3px 0px 3px;white-space: nowrap;overflow: hidden;} /* the container window for a WYSIWYG popup menu */ .popupwindow{border: 1px solid APPWORKSPACE;padding: 3px;position: absolute;left: 0px;top: 0px;z-index: 5;} /* the WYSIWYG color popup */ #popup_forecolor{padding: 3px;} /* the WYSIWYG font popup */ #popup_fontname{padding: 1px;overflow: auto;overflow-x: hidden;overflow-y: scroll;} /* the WYSIWYG size popup */ #popup_fontsize{padding: 1px;} /* the WYSIWYG smilie popup */ #popup_smilie{padding: 1px;overflow: auto;overflow-x: hidden;overflow-y: scroll;} /* the WYSIWYG attach popup */ #popup_attach{padding: 1px;overflow: auto;overflow-x: hidden;overflow-y: scroll;} /* the context-notification area for WYSIWYG font and size feedback */ #fontOut, #sizeOut, .popup_feedback div{height: 16px;border: 0px solid;padding: 0px 2px 0px 2px;cursor: default;font: 11px tahoma;overflow: hidden;} #E1E1E2;color: #000000;padding: 1px;border: none;} .ocolor, .ofont, .osize, .osmilie, .osyscoloar, .smilietitle{background: #FFFFFF;color: #000000;border: 1px solid #FFFFFF;} .popup_pickbutton{border: tahoma;overflow: hidden;}}
